name: Pistol
story: A gun that used to kill several people, once owned by a serial killer, was finally caught by the authority and went missing from the crime scene.
ending: Bloodlust fill your mind, smiling with sinister face, you remember all of your past, all the kill that committed. You laugh maniacally. You raise your head to see the surrounding, a familiar neighbour in sight. It's time to start the killing again.
